DOC.brief_summary: Identifying optimal time extubation brain injured population improve patient outcome . Brain injured patient usually remain intubated due concern airway maintenance . Current practice argues unconscious patient need remain intubated protect airway . More recent data however suggest delay extubation population increase pneumonias worsens patient outcomes . We design safety feasibility study randomize brain injured patient early delayed extubation . The purpose gain insight patient safety concern obtain estimate sample size need large study .
